synopsis: void PxBcopy(PxUChar_t const *s, PxUChar_t *d, PxSize_t len);

arguments.name: s
arguments.description: Source where the bytes are copied from

arguments.name: d
arguments.description: Destination where the bytes are copied to

arguments.name: len
arguments.description: Number of bytes to be copied

long.text: PxBcopy copies `len` bytes starting from `s` to `d`. The areas `[s,s+len-1]` and `d,d+len-1]` must not overlap.
